mosinstall.name: default
mosinstall.author: soeren
mosinstall.description: The default theme is a clean and basic layout for VirtueMart.

param.name: productListStyle
param.label: Product List Style
param.description: Select the style of the product listings (=browse page)
param.option: Flat Product List (fixed to 1 product per row, using a table)

param.name: cssStyle
param.label: Color Scheme
param.description: Select the Color Scheme

param.name: showFeedIcon
param.label: Show the Feed Icon?
param.description: Show/Hide the Feed Icon Link so customers can subscribe for the Product News Syndication.

param.name: showAddtocartButtonOnProductList
param.label: Show the Add-to-cart Button on the product list?
param.description: Show/Hide the add-to-cart button on the main product listings. Customers will then be able to purchase the product from the details page only.

param.name: showVendorLink
param.label: Show Vendor Link?
param.description: Show/Hide the link to the vendor of a product

param.name: showManufacturerLink
param.label: Show Manufacturer Link?
param.description: Show/Hide the link to the manufacturer of a product

param.name: showAvailability
param.label: Show Availability Information?
param.description: Show/Hide the availability information of a product

param.name: showPathway
param.label: Show additional Pathway on the Product Page?
param.description: Show/Hide the pathway on the product details page (The global pathway is updated anyway)

param.name: product_navigation
param.label: Show Prev/Next Product Link?
param.description: Show Prev/Next product link on product detail/flypage

param.name: FlypageReflection
param.label: Use Image Reflection in flypage?
param.description: Use Image Reflection in the product detail page.

param.name: BrowseReflection
param.label: Use Image Reflection in browse page?
param.description: Use Image Reflection in the product list page.

param.name: SnapshotReflection
param.label: Use Image Reflection in product snapshot?
param.description: Use Image Reflection in the product snapshot. This will affect most joomla modules.

param.name: reflectionHeight
param.label: Reflection Image Height
param.description: Height of the reflection image from 10% to 100% of the image height.

param.name: useLightBoxImages
param.label: Open Product Images in a LightBox?
param.description: Lightbox is an images showing widget. It opens the image in a centered position and hides the other part of the website under a gray overlay.

param.name: useGreyBoxOnCheckout
param.label: Customer Checkout in a popup (GreyBox)?
param.description: GreyBox is a webpage UI dialog widget. It opens the page in a new inline-window and hides the other part of the website under a gray overlay.

param.name: useAjaxCartActions
param.label: Use Ajax to add, update or delete products from the cart?
param.description: When enabled, the customer can put products into his/her cart without being redirected to a new page. Customers who have disabled Javascript will still be able to add/update/delete products to/from the cart.

param.name: popUpDuration
param.label: Duration of the ajax popup
param.description: When shopcart is updated, there will be a popup asking shopper whether to continue shopping or go to shopcart. You can change the popup duration with this value.

param.name: showFeatured
param.label: Show featured products on frontpage?
param.description: When enabled, featured products will be shown on the front page of VirtueMart.

param.name: showlatest
param.label: Show the latest products on the frontpage?
param.description: When enabled, latest products will be shown on the front page of VirtueMart.

param.name: showRecent
param.label: Number of recent products to Display?
param.description: The number of recently viwed products to display on the browse and detail pages of VirtueMart.
